input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: MSSCCMActor.

Sample items Xml:
<items> <item> <target>config2</target> <collection-id>COLLROOT</collection-id> <resource-id>27</resource-id> <resource-class-name>SMS_R_System</resource-class-name> <rule-name>RuleName</rule-name> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
item [Required] This is a child tag of <items> tag. The <item> tag can be specified multiple times to support "multiple items support".
target [Optional]: This element to specify the connection information for the Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager application.
Valid values: The value specified for <target> XML element must be same as the value that has been specified for the name attribute of <config> element in Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Default value: If this element is not provided or left empty, the request will be executed on the first defined Grid Manager adapter configuration.
Note: The value of this tag is case sensitive.
collection-id [Required] Id of the collection wherein the resource is to be added.
resource-id [Required] Id of the resource to be added.
resource-class-name [Optional] Name of the resource class to which the resource belongs. Valid values: SMS_R_User, SMS_R_IPNetwork, SMS_R_System, SMS_R_UserGroup.
Description of these values: SMS_R_User : class name that represents user objects within a Configuration Manager site hierarchy. SMS_R_IPNetwork : class name that represents the resources discovered by the Network Discovery Agent. SMS_R_System : class name that represents system resources. SMS_R_UserGroup : class name that represents user group objects.
Default value: SMS_R_System
rule-name [Optional] The name of the rule.
Default value: None

output.description: Returned adapter response is captured in this context parameter.

documentation.description:
Add Resource To Collection
This process adds a resource to a collection. This process is equivalent to adding a rule of "Direct" type to the collection.
